choose.when: email like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_purchase(mno, cartno, pno, title, price, quantity) values (#{mno}, #{cartno}, #{pno}, #{title}, #{price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select count(purno) FROM tbl_purchase WHERE purno > 0
select count(purno) FROM tbl_purchase WHERE purno > 0 and mno=#{mno}
SELECT NVL(sum(price),0) FROM TBL_PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{todayString}
SELECT NVL(sum(price),0) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(regdate,'mm') = #{month}) WHERE to_char(regdate,'d')=#{i}
SELECT NVL(sum(price),0) FROM TBL_PURCHASE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y')=#{yearString}
SELECT NVL(sum(price),0) FROM TBL_PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM')=#{monthString}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT TITLE, sum(QUANTITY) AS QUANTITY FROM TBL_PURCHASE WHERE TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM')=#{monthString} GROUP BY title ORDER BY QUANTITY DESC) WHERE rownum <= 5
